level.text: Each individual eligible to receive services shall meet all of the following requirements:
Is a District of Columbia resident:
Has a gross income at or below one hundred percent (100%) of the Federal Poverty Level (FPL);
Has resource limits of $2,600 for an individual and $3,000 for an individual and his/her spouse;
Owns no property other than the home in which he or she lives and a car;
Is not eligible for the traditional Medicaid program under Titles XIX and XXI of the Social Security Act;
Does not reside in a long-term care facility, mental health facility, or penal institution; and
Has completed an informed consent form at the time of application.
